data.message: Beyoncé does not belong on an Eminem song. Gag. Will wait for the rest of the album before judging though!

replies.message: I can’t believe all the trump “supporters” commenting on this post 😂😂😂
Amanda Jones haha yeah I backed out quickly after making my comment due to such ridiculousness

Beyoncé being on an Eminem song was surprising. Glad to see that despite not thinking Bey deserved to be in the song, you ain't judging how the album will sound. Finally someone mature enough to think that way. Besides the final 9 seconds show that the entire album ain't gonna be like that.
Yeah that ending is definitely ramping up to something different. I’m with you though Joel, not feeling the Beyoncé feature.

Mark - for sure. I prefer to wait to judge songs I initially don’t like in the context of the album because sometimes it changes my mind. 

I have nothing against the feature itself, I just haven’t been able to stand Beyoncé since about 2004.
